author: John Hanslip
content:
If you want a fast curry for Â£8 without any frills, this is the biz.  You get a plate of rice then choose 3 currys from an array of loveliness.  I usually get the chicken tikka, lamb spinach and one other random spoon full (it was Lamb and Carrots this time, hahaha mental).

But yes if you are short for time, you can be in and out in 10 minutes.  I love it.
